precondition: The Start button is visible on the taskbar.
expected_results: The Start Menu will open, displaying program shortcuts and system options.

precondition: The Start Menu is open and displaying the 'Control Panel' label in its right pane.
action: Click the 'Control Panel' label in the Start Menu's right pane.
expected_results: The Start Menu will close, and a 'Control Panel' window will open, becoming the active window as indicated on the taskbar.

precondition: The Control Panel is displayed in "Category View", with tooltips enabled.
action: Hover the mouse cursor over the icon for the 'Appearance and Themes' category.
expected_results: A tooltip will appear next to the icon, displaying the text "Change the appearance of desktop items, apply a theme or screen saver to your computer, or customize the Start menu and taskbar."

precondition: The tooltip describing the 'Appearance and Themes' category is visible.
action: Move the mouse cursor away from the 'Appearance and Themes' icon.

precondition: The Control Panel Icon View is visible within the 'Appearance and Themes' window.
expected_results: The main content area will display the 'Themes' settings within the 'Display Properties' section. A monitor preview and the active 'Themes' tab will be visible.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' dialog box is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected. The 'Screen saver' dropdown list shows 'Windows XP' as the selected option.
action: Click the 'Screen saver' dropdown list and select '[None]'.
expected_results: The 'Screen saver' dropdown list will show '[None]' as the selected option and the 'Settings' button will become disabled.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' dialog box is open.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box will open.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open and the 'Power Schemes' tab is active.
action: Click the dropdown menu labeled 'System hibernates'.
expected_results: A dropdown menu labeled 'System hibernates' will expand to reveal a list of time options.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open and the 'Power Schemes' tab is selected.
expected_results: A list of time options will appear.

precondition: A dialog box titled 'Power Options Properties' is open.
action: Click the 'Close' button in the top-right corner of the dialog box.
expected_results: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box will close.

precondition: The 'Power Schemes' dropdown menu is open.
expected_results: The 'Power Schemes Dropdown Menu' will be replaced with the text 'Always On'. The 'Save As...' and 'Delete' buttons will move to the right of the 'Always On' text.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open and the 'Hibernate' tab is selected.
action: Click on the 'System hibernates:' dropdown menu.
expected_results: A dropdown menu with a list of time options will appear.

precondition: The 'Power Options Properties' dialog box is open and the 'Power Schemes' tab is active.
action: Click on the 'System hibernates:' dropdown menu.
expected_results: The dropdown menu will expand to reveal a list of time options.

precondition: The 'System hibernates:' dropdown menu is expanded.
expected_results: The option 'Never' will be selected in the 'System hibernates:' dropdown menu.

precondition: The 'System hibernates:' dropdown menu is open.
expected_results: The 'System hibernates:' dropdown menu will close. The 'Delete' button will become active.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' dialog box is open and the 'Screen Saver' tab is selected.
expected_results: The 'Screen Saver' tab will become the active view within the 'Display Properties' dialog box.

precondition: The 'Display Properties' dialog box is open.
action: Click anywhere outside of the 'Display Properties' dialog box.
expected_results: The 'Display Properties' dialog box will close.
